verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You are more beautiful than anyone ever.
Everyday You're the same; You never change, no never.

verse.name: p1
verse.lines:
And how could I ever deny the love of my Savior?
You are to me everything, all I need, forever.
How could You be so good?

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
There is no one like You.
There has never ever been anyone like You.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Everywhere, You are there, earth or air, surrounding.
I'm not alone, the heavens sing along,
My God, You're so astounding.

verse.name: p2
verse.lines:
How could You be so good to me?
Eternally I believe.

verse.name: b1
verse.lines: You, You, You, You, You, You.

verse.name: b2
verse.lines:
How could You be so good to me?
How could You be so good to me?
We're not alone, so sing along.
We're not alone, so sing along,
Sing along, sing along.

verse.name: b3
verse.lines:
There is no one like You.
There has never ever been anyone like You.
There is no one like You.
There has never been anyone like You.
There is no one like our God, yeah.
